column4: This is really weird.  I can't restart compiz using "compiz --replace" because I get an error,   but I can restart compiz by going through the appearance preferences tool.   I looked at the source code for how the appearance prefs dlg does it,  and all it does is call "compiz --replace"  :-P
killall compiz && nohup compiz & should work
should... but I get the same error when I even run compiz by itself:  http://dpaste.com/82146/

so for whatever reason, I can't restart compiz via cmdline,  but the appearance prefs can restart compiz just fine...   I'm trying to be able to restart from cmdline because I need compiz to reload my xmodmap from time to time
